name: double-kick
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Hits twice in one turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.
